QuestData.Title: Bleeding the Enemy
QuestData.Description: I will not lie to you, $n. We face a tremendous challenge ahead of us.$B$BAs you go behind the enemy lines into Neferset City, I want you to bring back the insignia of any Neferset scum you defeat.$B$BIt will be a boon to our armies to know that you've dealt a crushing blow to the enemy.
QuestData.CompletionText: It is good to see you once more, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent job, $n. Our troops will hear of your deeds.
